animeDescription: In the near future, a battle card game called "Battle Spirits" has gained enormous popularity. Players of the game—known as "Battlers"—start duelings everywhere using their color-coded cards with different attributes, creating a "Sengoku (Warring States) period" for the game.  (Source: ANN)
animeRelated: ['Saikyou Ginga Ultimate Zero: Battle Spirits', 'Battle Spirits: Double Drive']
